title: The Clique Set
description: All 8 paperbacks by Lisi Harrison in her popular series: The Clique. Included in this set are the following titles:The CliqueBest Friends For NeverThe Revenge of the WannabesInvasion of the Boy SnatchersThe Pretty Committee Strikes BackDial L For LoserIt's Not Easy Being MeanSealed With a Diss
author: Lisi Harrison
